name: RT_com
text:
The long-running #BLM rallies, which had seen 100+ nights of continued protest, resumed at the weekend. Around 200 protesters gathered on Saturday to march through the Oregon city, smashing store windows and tagging buildings with graffiti on their way. 

https://t.co/ZjO3XL8caB https://t.co/lHVOuXrZ7l
